attributes.action: ensure that Petersfield councillors be personally charged with the cost of the cycle tracks they created in the town centre car park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petersfield town council has elected to introduce cycle tracks in the centre of the roadway between lines of parked vehicles in the town centre car park. This means that cars reversing from their parking places will be in great danger of backing directly into the path of the cyclists.

The cyclists will be deceived into thinking that the cycle track is a safe haven.

These tracks are total nonsense, extremely dangerous and should never have been authorised.

Those who authorized them should be personally liable for the cost of making the tracks and also of removing them

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
